# numberOfButtons

**Instance Property**

The number of buttons on the action sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfButtons: Int { get }
```

## Configuring buttons

- **addButton(withTitle:)**: Adds a custom button to the action sheet.
- **buttonTitle(at:)**: Returns the title of the button at the specified index.
- **cancelButtonIndex**: The index number of the cancel button.
- **destructiveButtonIndex**: The index number of the destructive button.
- **firstOtherButtonIndex**: The index of the first custom button.
